summary: In London, when Australian gangsters disguised as "Bobbies" rob British criminals, the panicked British mobsters seek an alliance with Scotland Yard in order to eliminate the foreign competition and return things to "normal".
cast: Peter Sellers|Lionel Jeffries|Bernard Cribbins|Davy Kaye|Nanette Newman|Bill Kerr|Ed Devereaux|Reg Lye|John Le Mesurier|Graham Stark|Martin Boddey|Irene Browne|Arthur Mullard|Dermot Kelly|Vanda Godsell|Tutte Lemkow|Barry Keegan|Michael Caine|George Lane Cooper|Maxwell Craig|Reggie de Beer|Dick Emery|Mario Fabrizi|Patrick Halpin|John Harvey|Walter Henry|John Junkin|Martin Lyder|Billy Murray|Jim O'Brady|Dennis Price|Bill Rayment|Ernie Rice|Cardew Robinson|Harold Siddons|Jack Silk|Jeff Silk|Gerald Sim|Marianne Stone|Davina Taylor|Joe Wadham
keywords: police|london england|tailing a suspect|jewel thief|fashion model
title: El honrado gremio del robo
